about: NexEra Immigration Consultants is a reputed Immigration Consultancy located in Hyderabad, India. Our professional team is dedicated to helping people to get ahead in life by immigrating to developed countries like the United States of America, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand and other Developed Countries.​With a very strong and unique services offer & combined experience of over 25 years, the company's presence in India has achieved remarkable expertise by helping people from around the world, in achieving their International Education, Career and Immigration goals. This has been accomplished through the dedicated & sincere approach of our professional team, who personally involves themselves in conducting intense research and sincere analysis based on our client’s requirements. Our expert advice has helped people in getting appropriate visa to conduct business, work, study or settle in any developed country.The unique feature of our company is the significant and superior client centric approach, where our clients are treated with respect they deserve. We differentiate ourselves by providing exceptional client service and what matters to our clients, matters most to us. Transparency is our way of dealing with our clients. The bottom line of our company is the great client service experience.Study VisasIf you already have an admission or looking for an admission in International Universities/Colleges and seeking help to get offer letters/study permit/study visas? Our ecosystem providers are an agnostic and continuously evolving mix of the best Talent Technology (VMS, On-Demand Platforms, Talent Cloud/Direct Sourcing and Recruiting) Service providers, Payrolling and Risk Management, and best in class consultants with extensive experience designing Global and Gig Workforce strategies for companies of all sizes.Sr. Executives look to us to assess, design, and deploy agile alternative workforce solutions, VMS Implementation, and talent supply chain strategies across industry sectors, in-house and outsourced. We Specialize in: • Originator of the ATP - Agile Talent Program Model (™) - Fully Outsourced, Internally Managed and Hybrid CWM Programs and Direct Sourcing Models, Gig Workforce (IC's, Contractors, Direct and Cloud Sourcing, SOW) Management, Optimization and Multi Talent Strategy, VMS Implementation• Helping Staffing and Talent Acquisition Technology providers increase effectiveness and expanding their workforce solutions offering and service model to increase revenue and growth.* On-Demand Talent Supply chain strategy, Supplier Optimization, RFP's, Contingent Workforce Management and Program Management Office optimizationSpecialties: Insourced/Outsourced or Hybrid Contingent Workforce Programs - Talent Acquisition Strategy - Talent Clouds and Direct Sourcing - Multi Talent Strategy - Risk Mitigation and Compliance - Vendor Supply Chain Strategies - Workforce Metrics and Analytics - Workforce Technology (VMS, RPO, Talent Recruitment, On-Demand Platforms, Talent Clouds.) Implementation … see more

about: Pratik is a Consultant in the Human Capital practice at Deloitte Consulting India Pvt. Ltd. (part of Deloitte Consulting LLP, USA).He has managed geographically dispersed Org. Change Management project teams from India for clients from across the globe (primarily US, Canada and Europe). He primarily manages Org. Change Management teams offshore in the India offices and collaborates with cross functional team to deliver change management projects. He has worked across Change Management deliverables and programs like Change Impact Assessments, Change Readiness Assessments, Training Delivery and Evaluations, Role to Position mapping, Communications Plan and others. He has also planned and organized Train-the-Trainer programs for the client and delivered soft skill training to clients. His primary expertise lies in advising clients in designing a value driven and effective Org. Change Management strategy for Technology Adoption. He has designed and develop Business Transformation change management and training programs across technologies like Siebel, Oracle R12, Agile PLM, for clients across all major industries with primary focus on Life Science and Pharmaceutical Industry. He has completed MBA (Major in Marketing,2013) and B.tech Biotechnology (VIT University, 2009). His key strengths are relationship management, multi-tasking, analytical and critical thinking and having result and impact oriented approach. Possess advance skill set MS PowerPoint/Word/Excel. … see more
